title: Send Discord announcement as single message with text + image
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: Tidying up the hive feed
gist.blurb: Our Discord bot just got a little smarter, combining text and images into a single, tidy message.
gist.summary: Refactored the Discord notification script to send content and images as a single multipart message.
gist.impact: Reduces API calls and ensures announcements appear as a single, cohesive unit in Discord channels.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee mascot acting as a postman, holding a single neat envelope that contains both a letter and a photo, symbolizing the unified message format. The setting is a cozy pixel art post office.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute bee mascot acting as a postman, holding a single neat envelope containing a photo and a letter. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The main character is a cute pixel art bee mascot with a round chubby yellow body and dark brown horizontal stripes, small black legs, two black antennae, black vertical oval eyes, bright pink rectangular blush marks on cheeks, a small happy smile, and small rounded light blue translucent wings. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text 'delivered'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art of the pollinations.ai bee placing a small photo inside an open letter envelope. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Symbolizing unified messages. Nostalgic but beautiful.
